humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the larger invasive tumor as 2.4 cm, which falls within the range for T2 tumors (more than 2 cm but not more than 5 cm). Therefore, the pathologic T stage for this patient's cancer is T2.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage is determined by the size of the largest invasive tumor. In this report, the larger invasive tumor measures 2.4 cm, which falls in the T2 category (tumor size 2.0-5.0 cm). Therefore, the T stage from this report is T2.
